content: संयत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To struggle, contend; देवासुरा वा एषु लोकेषु संयेतिरे. {@--2@} To form or be formed in rows. {@--3@} To agree, coincide.
संयत् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} A battle, war, fight; यः संयति प्राप्तपिनाकिलीलः <ls>R. 6. 72</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 39</ls>; <ls n="R.">18. 21</ls>; <ls>Ki. 1. 19</ls>; <ls>Śi. 16. 15.</ls>
